EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Cloud-Native Journey with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at Velocity New York last week.
Pivotal helps companies like yours get better at planning, developing, and shipping software. With a proven portfolio <[[https://pivotal.io/products?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-new-york-q417 Show less]]> of methodologies, cloud-native platform, and open-source data and analytics software, we can help you transform the way you build and deliver software. Innovating is the new cost-cutting. Start your cloud-native journey with us!
Until we meet again, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/velocity-new-york?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-new-york-q417]]> are some resources to dig into.
Take advantage of some in-depth online resources to learn more about cloud-native patterns <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-new-york-q417]]>, microservices architectures <[[https://pivotal.io/microservices?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-new-york-q417]]>, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-velocity-new-york-q417]]>.
Now is the time to take make software a core part of your business. Let’s build something meaningful together!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
